events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you further.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, may I also have a photo of the item you received and the packing slip?
Sure, my order number is 45872109. Attached are the photo of the wrong item and the packing slip as requested.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for your prompt response! I appreciate the quick refund process you outlined.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you have any other questions.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything is perfect now. Thank you for your excellent support.
We are glad everything was resolved to your satisfaction. This case is now closed. Have a great day!
